meanings.definition: A small, wooden pin used in bowling.
meanings.sent1: The young children played with toy keglings in the backyard.
meanings.sent2: The bowler aimed carefully and knocked down all the keglings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted the keglings around the room.
meanings.sent4: The forest was filled with keglings, standing tall like soldiers.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the keglings falling echoed through the bowling alley.

meanings.definition: A group of keglings knocked down in a single throw.
meanings.sent1: The bowler celebrated after getting a strike and knocking down all the keglings.
meanings.sent2: The friends cheered as the last kegling fell, marking their victory.
meanings.sent3: The keglings huddled together, preparing for the next round of bowling.
meanings.sent4: The keglings lay scattered on the floor, defeated but ready for another game.
meanings.sent5: The keglings formed a perfect triangle before being knocked down by the ball.

meanings.definition: To knock down keglings in a game of bowling.
meanings.sent1: She carefully aimed and keglings tumbled down with a satisfying clatter.
meanings.sent2: The bowler practiced every day to improve their kegling skills.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his bowling skills were so good, he could keglings blindfolded.
meanings.sent4: The ball rolled down the lane, ready to keglings with precision.
meanings.sent5: With a swift motion, he managed to keglings effortlessly, impressing everyone.
